entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as the one who has been feeding the creatures for the Hallowe’en feast. He is described as being happy and giving them a bit of help.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as asking Hagrid what he has been feeding the creatures. He also mentions that he had reason to believe that Hagrid's umbrella was not all it looked.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as making a comment about Hagrid using an Engorgement Charm on the creatures.

entities.name: hallowe’en feast
entities.description: The Hallowe’en feast is mentioned as the reason for Hagrid feeding the creatures.

relationships.description: Hagrid has been feeding the creatures for the Hallowe’en feast.
